content: free pattern and video tutorial to watch in my blog i used swan thai black yarn of tresfere and a crochet hook size 4 5 mm the final size of the seashell is about 10 cm english pattern link https //www giuliapinkytime com/en/crochet-scallop-seashell-tutorial/ schema in italiano https //www giuliapinkytime com/conchiglia-canestrello/
